author: Stacy Chen
title: Gyms, salons, tattoo parlors in parts of Utah reopen with revised order
description: While the fear of COVID-19 is widely shared, there has been discord in Utah among local officials regarding how to undertake the most effective response.
content:
Utah is one of nine states in the country that has not issued a statewide shelter-in-place order -- and while the fear of COVID-19 is widely shared, there has been a broad range of responses varying from county to county within the state.
